explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of a PSO Deep-ConvLSTM network for predicting futures price differentials, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.deep learning: The methodology involves a deep learning model (Deep-ConvLSTM) for capturing intricate market patterns.
explanations.neural network: The model used is a neural network-based approach (ConvLSTM).
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper specifically mentions the use of LSTM (long short-term memory) in the model.
explanations.LSTM: The paper compares the performance of the proposed model with traditional LSTM models.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The model incorporates CNN (convolutional neural network) aspects through ConvLSTM.
explanations.CNN: The ConvLSTM model includes convolutional neural network components.
explanations.representation learning: The model learns representations of temporal-spatial data in financial markets.
explanations.feature learning: The model learns features from financial market data to predict price spreads.
explanations.feature representation: The model captures and represents features from market data for forecasting.
